I will continue to keep my promise to those in the #TX15 to do all that I can to improve their quality of life as tomorrow is a new day and our work does not cease.

Today will go down in history but tomorrow is another day. Tomorrow, we will resume our work #ForThePeople to lower prescription drug costs, to fight for debt-free education, to ensure care for our seniors, our veterans, and those with special needs. (2/3)

Today is a solemn day for our country and the #TX15. I did not come to Congress to impeach a president, but the facts are clear and convincing. I am obligated by my oath of office to #defendourdemocray and our Constitution. (1/3)

ICYMI: I took to the House floor to urge my colleagues to support #impeachment and #DefendOurDemocracy. 

The evidence is clear - the president used his office for personal and political gain. 

We cannot let this abuse of power go unchecked. pic.twitter.com/m679qRBCOu

I will vote to #DefendOurDemocracy. 

Our Founding Fathers feared that one day the executive branch would stretch beyond the limits of its power.
